## Bio

[Kelly McConville](http://mcconville.rbind.io/) is an Associate Professor of Statistics at [Reed College](https://www.reed.edu/math/) in Portland, Oregon.  Her methodological research involves incorporating novel modeling techniques into survey estimators.  She is currently spending her sabbatical as a Visiting Research Scientist at the Rocky Mountain Research Station of FIA.  With big help from Gretchen Moisen and Tracey Frescino, she runs an undergraduate research program as part of the Reed Forestry Data Science Research Lab.  They have mentored 24 undergraduate students with majors ranging from Statistics to English!  In addition to her regular teaching duties, she has taught several continuing education short courses, webinars, and workshops on `R` and various data science and statistics topics.
